charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw Hassel in
the academy courtyard.
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_020:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Are you
here to take my class?
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_030:
Oh, I see. I thought this would be a great
opportunity.
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_040:
You see, just a few minutes ago, I was
giving a lecture on Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_050:
It’s a teacher’s duty to help students harness
their talents!
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_0401_070:
It was a little tough, but Baxcalibur helped
me out!
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_0402_090:
Yes! He did a great job assisting me with
the students.
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_100:
He adjusted his battle style for the sync pairs
who are still rough around the edges.
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_110:
Just what I’d expect from the dragon
guarding the final fortress of the
Paldea League!
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_120:
We’ve been partners for so long, we’re
on the same wavelength. I can really
depend on him.
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_130:
Through all the years—through thick
and thin...
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_140:
Wh-when I think about it... Th-the tears...
BWUUUH huh huh hoi hoi!
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_190:
That phrase refers to a person of great
talent who has yet to go out into the world.
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_200:
Just as a small Pokémon like Frigibax evolves
into courageous, dependable Baxcalibur...
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_210:
I believe that the up-and-coming sync pairs
of Pasio will all grow into something great.
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_220:
You are one of those up-and-comers, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_230: I eagerly await seeing how you will grow!
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_240:
Anytime you feel lost and unsure where to
go next...
charaepi_ch0335_00_hassaku/2301_1201_250: please come and take my class!
